summary: The bill, titled the Helping Emergency Responders Overcome Student Debt Act (HEROES Act), amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to include volunteer firefighters and emergency medical technicians as eligible for the Public Service Loan Forgiveness Program. It defines "qualified volunteer firefighter" and "qualified volunteer emergency medical technician" and tasks the Secretary of Education with setting minimum volunteer time requirements and creating regulations for verifying volunteer service for loan forgiveness purposes.
